ultimateCard.title: The Ermine's Eye
ultimateCard.text: Target an adjacent hex. Deal 4[+] damage to the nearest enemy hero in line with the target hex and the caster, then apply [S]Slow and [D]Disarm to them.

ultimateCard.title: Call of the Queen
ultimateCard.text: Apply [R]Frenzy to Nantaca. Her Attack actions hit all enemy heroes adjacent to and in LoS with friendly minions, in addition to their original target.

ultimateCard.title: Release the Beast
ultimateCard.text: Place target adjacent hero in the <Belly of the Beast> battlefield. Apply [S]<Slow> and [D]<Disarm> to that hero.

ultimateCard.title: BOOM
ultimateCard.text: Place Doomies on target <empty> hex anywhere on the battlefield {(LoS not required)}. Deal 1 damage to all adjacent enemies and push them 1 hex.

ultimateCard.title: None Shall Enter
ultimateCard.text: Place each hero and minion hit in the hex outside the AoE closest to their current hex. Hexes in the AoE block movement and LoS.

ultimateCard.title: Enter the Void Palace
ultimateCard.text: Place Kumaya and target enemy hero in the Void Palace.

ultimateCard.title: Word Of Nupten
ultimateCard.text: Heal each friendly hero in Akhuti's LoS 3 HP. Apply [D]Disarm to each enemy hero in her [I]Illusion's LoS.

ultimateCard.title: Eye Of The Storm
ultimateCard.text: Ekhrit cannot be targeted. Place the AoE on top of her [I]Illusion. Deal 2 damage to each enemy hit and Push them 2 hexes.

ultimateCard.title: Last Judgment
ultimateCard.text: Place the AoE on target hex anywhere on the battlefield (LoS is not required). Deal 4 damage to each enemy hero hit.

ultimateCard.title: Flashback
ultimateCard.text: You can play this card only when the last hero is Exhausted during the Heroes Phase. Ready Shafathi. Then, you may Place him adjacent to his [I]Illusion.

ultimateCard.title: Blades Of Lightning
ultimateCard.text: When Haburat declares an Attack action, deal 4[+] damage to all enemies adjacent to his [I]Illusion.

ultimateCard.title: Echo Dance
ultimateCard.text: Move all friendly [I]Illusions 3 hexes. Then, you may Place any friendly hero in LoS of their [I]Illusion.

ultimateCard.title: Consulting The Heart
ultimateCard.text: Search your deck for a power card, reveal it and draw it. Shuffle your deck. Nelaclen may play that card immediately, ignoring all restrictions and mana cost.

ultimateCard.title: Coma Toxin
ultimateCard.text: Defeat target enemy hero adjacent to a [P]Pillar, if they have half or fewer of their starting HP.

ultimateCard.title: The Thousandth Ritual
ultimateCard.text: Apply a condition of your choice to each hero in LoS of Tlakali or in LoS of a [P]Pillar.

ultimateCard.title: My Kingdom
ultimateCard.text: Remove any friendly Pillar from the battlefield. Then, Place up to two friendly [P]Pillars anywhere on the battlefield (these pillars contribute to the maximum number of pillars). Defeat enemy minions adjacent to each [P]Pillar.

ultimateCard.title: From Below
ultimateCard.text: Place Ixatosk adjacent to a [P]Pillar. You may Spawn 2 friendly minions.

ultimateCard.title: Totemic Slam
ultimateCard.text: Deal 4 damage and apply [S]Slow to target adjacent enemy hero. Then, Push the target 3 hexes. If the target ends the push adjacent to a [P]Pillar, deal 2[+] damage to them.

ultimateCard.title: Featherstorm
ultimateCard.text: Place Corjof anywhere on the battlefield. Then, if Corjof is [H]Shapeshifted, deal 3[+] damage and apply [D]Disarm to an adjacent enemy hero.

ultimateCard.title: Glacial Rebirth
ultimateCard.text: Heal each friendly hero on the battlefield 3 HP. Then, if Freyhel is [H]Shapeshifted, heal each enemy hero in Freyhel's LoS 3 HP.

ultimateCard.title: Song of the Siren
ultimateCard.text: Exhaust target enemy hero.

ultimateCard.title: Feral Vitality
ultimateCard.text: Remove any condition from Gulbjarn and heal him to full HP. Then, if Gulbjarn is [H]Shapeshifted, Push each enemy hero adjacent to him 2 hexes.

ultimateCard.title: Dance Of The Predator
ultimateCard.text: Move Shyllavi 3 hexes. Then, deal 2[+] damage to an adjacent enemy. Then, if Shyllavi is [H]Shapeshifted, you may repeat both effects an additional time.

ultimateCard.title: Curse Of Years
ultimateCard.text: Deal damage to target enemy hero equal to half of their current HP. If the target is [M]Marked, heal Kichie for the amount of damage dealt.

ultimateCard.title: Caged Soul
ultimateCard.text: Choose a friendly hero on the battlefield. When that hero would be Defeated this Heroes Phase, heal them to full HP instead.

ultimateCard.title: Shuriken Storm
ultimateCard.text: Sakoshi's Attack actions hit all enemy minions and all [M]Marked enemy heroes in LoS in addition to their original target.

ultimateCard.title: Supernova
ultimateCard.text: Deal 4 damage to all enemies within 2 hexes. Deals piercing damage to [M]Marked enemies.

ultimateCard.title: Demonic Possession
ultimateCard.text: Apply [R]Frenzy and [F]Fast to Akimo. Akimo may immediately take an Attack action against target adjacent [M]Marked enemy hero.

ultimateCard.title: Kneel Before Me
ultimateCard.text: Deal 4 damage and apply [S]Slow to target enemy hero. Place the target adjacent to Yami and [M]Mark them.
